  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2806</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Which is Which? - lesson plan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Welches ist, welches? - Lektionplan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quel est quel ? - plan de leçon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Qual é qual? - planta da lição</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quale è quale? - programma di lezione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όποιος είναι όποιοι; - σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cuál es cuál? - plan de la lección</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson plan for a reading comprehension activity on a text about Neil Armstrong and his visit to the moon.Students are asked to rephrase the text. Includes assessment rubric.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expresion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">language</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rephrasing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">assessment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Lektionplan für eine Leseerfassenaktivität 
auf einem Text über Neil Armstrong und seinen Besuch zum 
moon.Students werden gebeten, den Text neuzuformulieren. 
Enthält Einschätzung Rubrik.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plan de leçon pour une activité de 
compréhension de lecture sur un texte au sujet de Neil Armstrong et 
sa visite au moon.Students sont invités à reformuler le texte. 
Inclut la rubrique d'évaluation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma planta da lição para uma atividade da 
compreensão da leitura em um texto sobre Neil Armstrong e sua visita 
ao moon.Students é pedida para rephrase o texto. Inclui o 
rubric da avaliação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma di lezione per un'attività di 
comprensione della lettura su un testo circa Neil Armstrong e la sua 
chiamata al moon.Students è chiesto di formulare nuovamente il testo.
Include la rubrica di valutazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για μια δραστηριότητα κατανόησης
ανάγνωσης σε ένα κείμενο για το Neil Armstrong και η 
επίσκεψή του στους σπουδαστές φεγγαριών καλούνται να 
διαμορφώσουν εκ νέου το κείμενο. Περιλαμβάνει τη ρουμπρίκα 
αξιολόγησης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un plan de la lección para una actividad de la 
comprensión de la lectura en un texto sobre Neil Armstrong y su 
visita al moon.Students se pide reformular el texto. Incluye la 
rúbrica del gravamen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftliches expresion</string>
          </keyword>
